sktemplate.name: sms/voice phone with country form

customHTML.value:
{{#ifEquals type "SMS"}} Text Message {{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "VOICE"}} Voice {{/ifEquals}}

{{#ifEquals type "SMS"}} Enter your phone number to receive passcodes by text message. {{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "VOICE"}} Enter your phone number to receive passcodes by phone call. {{/ifEquals}}

+1
{{#if buttonLabel}} {{/if}} {{#if cancelButtonLabel}} {{/if}}

/**
 * Sync value display with the value of the dropdown
 */
const updateCountryCode = (event) => {
  countryCodeDisplay.innerText = event.target.value;
}

/**
 * Focus an element for the provider id
 */
const setFieldFocus = (id) => {
    const element = document.getElementById(id);
    if (element) {
        element.focus();
    }
}

/**
 * Determine if executing on Window's machine
 */
const isWindows = () => {
  return navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Windows') !== -1;
}

/**
 * Set default country
 */
const selectCountryByAttribute = (selectElement, countryCode) => {
  for (let i = 0; i < selectElement.options.length; i++) {
    if (selectElement.options[i].getAttribute('data-country').toLowerCase() === countryCode.toLowerCase()) {
      selectElement.selectedIndex = i; 
      selectElement.dispatchEvent(new Event('change')); 
      break; 
    }
  }
}

/**
 * Start function to initialize form
 */
const start = () => {
    setFieldFocus("phone");

    countryData.forEach(country => {
      let opt = document.createElement('option');
      let flag = showFlags.toUpperCase() === "SHOW" && !isWindows() ? country.flag_code : ""
      opt.setAttribute('data-country', country.code);
      opt.value = country.dial_code;
      opt.innerHTML = `${country.name} ${country.dial_code} ${flag}`; 
      countryCode.append(opt);
    });

    countryCode.addEventListener("change", updateCountryCode);
    
    if (defaultCountry) {
      selectCountryByAttribute(countryCode, defaultCountry)
    } else {
      // Default to US if default country not set
      selectCountryByAttribute(countryCode, "US")
    }

}

if (document.readyState === "loading") {
    // Loading hasn't finished yet
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", start);
} else {
    // `DOMContentLoaded` has already fired
    start();
}

nodeDescription.value: Phone number with country code dropdown
